text:
The user_token member of apr_procattr_t in
include/arch/win32/apr_arch_threadproc.c is wrapped in an #ifndef _WIN32_WCE. 
However the static method attr_cleanup does not wrap its access of that member
in a conditional block.  The method is static and only called from other code
that is suppressed for WinCE, so the attached patch suppresses the entire method
under WinCE.
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18506
Suppress static method accessing hidden member
Mass reassign the 44 open apr-bugs to apr bug list
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
It compiles and builds fine on VS C++ 6.0

Sidenote: Code which uses this function is already #ifndef _WIN32_WCE.
creator: davi@apache.org

text:
Having problems translating this into branches/0.9.x - but it's applied
to apr 1.2 and trunk.  Thanks for the report!
